column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My husband and I went to the nursery to look at trees .
#text=We wanted to plant a tree in the front yard , but we were n't sure what to get yet .
#text=We wandered through the nursery and considered a few of our option .
#text=We did n't want a large tree , like a pine tree .
#text=We did n't want a small tree , like a Japanese maple .
#text=When we spoke to one of the workers at the nursery , he suggested that we plant a crabapple .
#text=It would have green leaves , and would have white flowers in the spring .
#text=We took the tree home in the back of our truck .
#text=My husband used our shovel to dig a hole in the ground .
#text=It took him some time - you have to dig a pretty big hole when you plant a tree !
#text=Then I helped him carry the tree over to the hole .
#text=We had to cut off the plastic bucket it was in .
#text=When we were done , we put it in the hole , and I helped by holding the tree steady and pushing dirt into the hole .
#text=Once we had filled in all the dirt around the tree , we turned on the sprinklers .
#text=We wanted to water the tree and get it off to a good start .
#text=We were excited to have a new tree in the front yard .
